text: Liep-Tjauw Tan was an Indonesian tennis player from Jakarta. Liep-Tjauw Tan became national champion in 1951. He competed at the 1953 Wimbledon Championships and 1955 Wimbledon Championships. In 1955 he was beaten in the first round. After becoming singles champion in 1953, he competed at the 1954 Asian Championships in Manilla. He married to an Indonesian tennis champion. ==References== ==External websites== *Dutch newspaper articles of Liep-Tjauw Tan - via Delpher *Image after becoming national champion. title: Liep-Tjauw Tan
